Message.Msg: There are people who have all the power in the world to make a difference. What did they do? Cap & Trade was adopted by US Congress in 2009. Almost 4 years ago! Do you know who put it under the rug? Harry Reid. Wise! Obama already spent tens of billions on green energy. Leading european countries did the same. Yet those storms keep coming in. Are you saying storms are coming because of bunch of wingnuts? And claiming your IQ is higher than room temperature?

Topic.Title: Jesse Jr. facing 5 years in the big house

Message.Msg: That has to be racism then. Just has to be. Has to be the white man holding him down. Just has to be.

Topic.Title: Jesse Jr. facing 5 years in the big house

Message.Msg: Few black politicians make it out of Chicago wif their morals intact.
